bibl.title: The Taxes in Grain in Ptolemaic Egypt. Granary Receipts from Diospolis Magna 164-88 B.C.
bibl.seg: Packman Zola M., The Taxes in Grain in Ptolemaic Egypt. Granary Receipts from Diospolis Magna 164-88 B.C. (American Studies in Papyrology. 4.)
New Haven - Toronto, American Society of Papyrologists, 1968, 4°, [viii]-84 pp. et 33 tabl.
C.R. par Tony Reekmans, BibO 28 (1971) pp. 59-61 - Sergis Daris, Aegyptus 47 (1967) p.284 - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 44 (1969) No. 87, pp 170-173.
